title: The Gunslinger Faces A Monster | Blood Moon | HD Western Horror Movie

sources.title: The Gunslinger Faces A Monster | Blood Moon | HD Western Horror Movie
sources.description:
The Gunslinger Faces A Monster | Blood Moon | HD Western Horror Movie  - 1887. In a deserted mining town in Colorado, a stagecoach full of passengers and an enigmatic gunslinger find themselves prisoners of two outlaws. As the travellers attempt to escape, it becomes apparent that a bigger menace lurks outside; a beast that only appears on the night of a blood moon.

Watch Blood Moon, a full action horror western set in 1887 in a deserted Colorado mining town. A stagecoach full of passengers and a mysterious gunslinger become prisoners of two ruthless outlaws, but their struggle to survive takes a darker turn when a terrifying werewolf-type monster emerges only on the night of the blood moon. Perfect for fans of western action movies, survival thrillers, full free horror films, creature feature movies, and suspenseful adventure films, Blood Moon delivers intense action, high-stakes danger, and a gripping fight for survival against both man and monster.

Stars: George Blagden, Tom Cotcher, Barrington De La Roche
